keyEvents.title: Dorry and Brogy's Latest Duel
keyEvents.description: The volcano on Little Garden erupts, signaling another battle between the two giants which ends in a draw.

keyEvents.title: Explosive Alcohol Incident
keyEvents.description: Dorry drinks sabotaged rum on Little Garden, causing an explosion that severely injures him.

keyEvents.title: Luffy vs Dorry Battle
keyEvents.description: Luffy fights the injured giant Dorry on Little Garden to defend his crew's honor.

keyEvents.title: Luffy's Rage at Sabotage
keyEvents.description: Luffy realizes that a third party on Little Garden has violated the giants' sacred duel and becomes furious.
